Abdoul Kairou Amoustapha (amụrụ n'ụbọchị mbụ n'ọnwa Jenụwarị n'afọ 2001) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba Cancún bọọlụ ugbu a na Liga de Expansión MX
Amoustapha si ASN Nigelec kwaga Loudoun United nke USL Championship na 20 Febụwarị 2020. O mere nke mbụ ya n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ 2020, malite megide Hartford Athletic na mmeri 1
N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2020, Amoustapha malitere ọzụzụ na klọb nne na nna Loudoun bụ D.C
United mgbe oge Loudoun gwụsịrị. N'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021, a kpọghachiri Amoustapha na klọb nne na nna ya, MFK Vyskov. E mechara zigara ya na Cancún F.C
Amoustapha apụtala ugboro atọ n'otu n'otu na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger U-17 na U-20
Ọ gbara goolu mba ụwa mbụ ya na U-20 n'oge 2019 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations, na 9 Febụwarị 2019, megide U-20 nke Burundi, n'egwuregwu nke gwụrụ na 3o3 draw.

N'abalị iri atọ na otu n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2020, ndị otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger kpọrọ Amoustapha dịka akụkụ nke ndị otu mbido maka asọmpi iko mba Afrịka nke afọ 2021. O mechara pụta nke mbụ ya na ndị otu mba ahụ na 13 Nọvemba, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya na mmeri Niger meriri Ethiopia.
